name: @guardianstack/guardianjs-free
description: Open-source, purely client-side browser fingerprinting library that computes a Guardian anchor-based visitor identifier.
author: GuardianStack

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsup src/index.ts --format esm,cjs,iife --global-name GuardianJS --dts --sourcemap --minify --out-dir dist
scripts.build:watch: npm run clean && tsup src/index.ts --format esm,cjs,iife --global-name GuardianJS --dts --sourcemap --watch --out-dir dist
scripts.lint: echo "No linter configured for guardianjs yet"
scripts.test: echo "No tests configured for guardianjs yet"
